thread.title: Man leaps to death from Sofitel hotel | New York Post
thread.title_full: Man leaps to death from Sofitel hotel | New York Post

author: Erik Blades
title: Man leaps to death from Sofitel hotel | New York Post
text:
A man jumped to his death from the luxury Sofitel New York Hotel on Monday afternoon, but emergency crews were having a hard time getting to his body because he landed on a lower-tier roof, authorities said.
The incident was reported at 4:42 p.m. at 45 W. 44th St., when witnesses said the man leaped from the tower of the hotel, then landed on a roof that is in-set from the street, about four stories up.
